messages.subject: Re: Chris
messages.msgSnippet: ... Are you kidding, Barb? You know me far better than that. :-) Posting is just a matter of finding time. DH is working at the firehouse 36 out of every 72
messages.messageBody:
--- In Unschooling-dotcom@y..., Barb Eaton <homemama@i...> wrote:
> Bridget now ya scaried her off! LOL!

Are you kidding, Barb? You know me far better than that. :-) Posting
is just a matter of finding time. DH is working at the firehouse 36
out of every 72 hours so its been crazy around here.
Glad to see familiar faces. Love the conversations and I look forward
to chatting more.

in peace,

Chris O'Connor

messages.subject: Re: Chris
messages.msgSnippet: ... Hi Bridget  good to see you too! Life has kept me very busy lately but I was in the mood to get plugged in for some unschool support. I ve been on
messages.messageBody:
--- In Unschooling-dotcom@y..., Bridget E Coffman
<rumpleteasermom@j...> wrote:
> Hi Chris!!!!
>
> Waving. Come to rabble rouse here a bit??? Nice to see you
> again. I've missed you elsewhere.

Hi Bridget <waving> good to see you too! Life has kept me very busy
lately but I was in the mood to get plugged in for some unschool
support. I've been on this list a few times but usually as a quiet
lurker.... believe that or not. :-)

in peace,

Chris O'Connor

messages.subject: Re: [Unschooling-dotcom] Chris
messages.msgSnippet: Bridget now ya scaried her off! LOL! Are you up by the Akron/Canton area? Once I get my car in better shape I want to get back up that way. I ll let you know
messages.messageBody:
Bridget now ya scaried her off! LOL! Are you up by the Akron/Canton
area? Once I get my car in better shape I want to get back up that way. I'll
let you know so maybe we could meet.:-)

Barb E

messages.subject: Re: [Unschooling-dotcom] Chris
messages.msgSnippet: Hi Chris!!!! Waving.  Come to rabble rouse here a bit???  Nice to see you again.  I ve missed you elsewhere. Bridget - In NE Ohio PS _ having worked in Hotels,
messages.messageBody:
Hi Chris!!!!

Waving. Come to rabble rouse here a bit??? Nice to see you again. I've
missed you elsewhere.

Bridget - In NE Ohio

PS _ having worked in Hotels, I have to say I agree about the Red Cross.
The send vouchers to get people rooms but it is like pulling teeth to get
them dealt with. I'll take trucking companies and insurance claims
anyday over a Red Cross voucher!


> > Leave it to me to enter a list with a loud opinion...
> > Chris O'Connor
> > Central Ohio
> >
> >


^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^
Tyranny of the majority is tyranny nonetheless.
